dcterms:description: A collection of diagnostic lung cancer screening thoracic CT scans. A random selection of 250 cases was chosen and the CT scan resampled to 2mm resolution. Each volume is projected using 256 × 256 pixel, 2mm resolution detectors, with angles equally spaced between 0° and 205°. 400 projections are created, first without any noise, then with Poisson noise, simulating measurement noise with 5 × 10^5 photons.
dcterms:title: LIDC-IDRI
